Package it.polimi.vovarini.model.board

Class Box

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.model.board.Box
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class represents a single box, or cell, of the Board

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      BoxFullException - If this box is full.

      public Item removeTopmost()
      Removes and returns the item on top of this box.
      Returns:
